notes: Authenticator:InvalidateExistingTokens defaults to false unless specified as "true"

Authenticator:TokenLifetimeInHours defaults to DEFAULT_TOKEN_LIFETIME [authenticator.fs] unless valid value specified; use "infinite" to prevent token expiry (unless server restarted and Authentication:InvalidateExistingTokens is "true")

Authenticator.// InvalidateExistingTokens: not defined here: define in appsettings.[development|production].json if required
Authenticator.// TokenLifetimeInHours: not defined here: define in appsettings.[development|production].json if required

notes: FilePersistenceFactory:SnapshotFrequency defaults to None unless valid value (which must be greater than 1) specified
FilePersistenceFactory:StrictMode defaults to false unless specified as "true"

FilePersistenceFactory.// RelativeRoot: not defined here: define in appsettings.[development|production].json if required
FilePersistenceFactory.// SnapshotFrequency: not defined here: define in appsettings.[development|production].json if required
FilePersistenceFactory.// StrictMode: not defined here: define in appsettings.[development|production].json if required

Migrator.// MigrateOnStartup: not defined here: define in appsettings.[development|production].json if required
Migrator.// Root: not defined here: define in appsettings.[development|production].json if required

notes: AnsiConsoleTheme::Code does not look so good in VS Code integrated terminal, so stick with SystemConsoleTheme::Literate (which is most likely the default anyway)
